pages.text: $(li)The Stone Pickaxe is the upgrade of the Wooden Pickaxe.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted placing a pair of Cobblestone blocks and Sticks in a Crafting Table.

$(li)This pickaxe opens the possibility of mine new blocks like Iron Ore and Lapis Lazuli Ore.$(br)$(li)Toolsmiths will exchange your Emeralds by Stone Pickaxes.$(br)$(li)The Stone Pickaxe has more durability than the Wooden Pickaxe.
